topic_metadata.title: How to flatten an array by one level

posts.cooked:
I have an array of arrays of arrays. I want to flatten by one level so that I have an array of arrays. Flatten takes the 3d array to a 1d array, but I want a 2d array. How can I do this?

#range(3,7).map(x => {
  range(3,7).map(y => {
    (x,y)
  })
}).flatten()

^ flattens to array of ints, want array of (int, int).
I think youâ€™re looking for join() or sum()? (join is more explicit so should probably be preferred)
posts.raw: I think you're looking for `join()` or `sum()`? (`join` is more explicit so should probably be preferred)
